Summary: It was like a moving blue-green star that was visible several seconds. It went North-East.
divs: Sighting Details1. Walking on the balcony 2. I have the habit to watch the stars when the skies are clear 3. Something unusual 4. It's speed was constant, but it was bright and dind't blink like an airplane 5. I was excited 6. The sky was clear, it didn't vanish into the horizont, but become less bright and less bright until it dissapeared.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Varna
There were no other sightings in Varna on or around June 16th 2009
